experience and a proven knowledge of IT strategy application development and advanced technology My career motivation has been to help the companies I work for achieve the full advantages of technology at the lowest cost possible Work Experience Sr Enterprise Architect Huntington Ingalls Industries Newport News Shipbuilding Newport News VA October 2014 to Present Currently I provide overall technical leadership and expertise in the creation of systems guidelines and standards and common services to support project requirements I work within Agile concepts around ideation to minimum viable product for integrating new applications cloud onpremise into the organizations portfolio of internal systems and existing cloud services I collaborate with technology vendors and external providers to understand new cloud services and technologies and their implications for the organization I also work with other architects to ensure new services align to roadmaps and to understand the effect on the organizations information architecture Analyzes enterprise business context trends and business strategy as well as change requirements in other architecture viewpoints to derive the integration architecture future state using incremental agile approaches based on minimum viable product that is extendable as usage dictates Develops manages and maintains an enterprise strategy and technology roadmap Defines highlevel migration plans to address the gaps between the current and future state with the mindset of incremental capability roadmaps to demonstrate value quickly yet with the ability to extend as needed in sync with the Corporate strategy and philosophy and IT budgeting or other capital planning processes Leads the development of agile repeatable integration technologyinformation solution patterns for application of appropriate technology to business requirement Leads the analysis of the current technology environment to detect critical deficiencies and recommends solutions for improvement Understands advocates and augments the business and IT strategies Adopt and promote industry standards best practice guiding principles aligned
